item.title: About
item.description: I’m an engineering student based in Calicut. My focus area for the past few years has been GNU /Linux computing and decentralized social networks. I’m also well-versed in event management and teaching. I have a strong desire to continue honing my skills and pursuing my interests in technology and education. Create a basic website Showcase this to gain infinite social credits Conquer the World ðŸ’€
